name: Shoulder of Orion
description:
Future. As the captain of the space shuttle, you set off on a research mission. You have to make measurements in a system called "Shoulder of Orion".

Unexpectedly, you fall into an asteroid's swarm. You must now use all your skills to get out of this in one piece.

Remember that the ship remains inert. You must operate the engines power to correct the flight path.

Main features:
* Demanding gameplay
* Increased level of difficulty
* 2 types of asteroids
* A pleasant soundtrack

The game was created during the fifth edition of the Game Dev School course.

Developers:
TEAM

KINGA DEMSKA - LEADER & PRODUCTION
PAWEŁ RATALEWSKI - PROGRAMING
BARTŁOMIEJ BORAWSKI - ART
KRZYSZTOF ZIÓŁKOWSKI - DESIGN

Thank You for downloading and playing the game.
